string.text: Clear the mutant's lair
The woodcutter asked to destroy the mutant's lair, as they cause some problems.

It is necessary to destroy some mutants. The place here is already unpopular in the stalker environment, so many people want to fight back here because of the fucking mutants, who are full in the forest and on the road, even on approaches. In general, with me coordinates and reward, with you execution. Is it going?
Thanks, maybe people can come here any more. Take for work:
Find artifact: %s
The woodcutter asked to get a certain artifact for him on behalf of the customer.

I have some buyers here, who would be interested in a certain artifact. But since we have poor anomalies here, I instruct other stalkers to get it. Your goal will be: %s. For a reward, of course. How are you?
Well done, then what you need. Hold:
Destroy the parking of bandits
You need to attack the parking of bandits and destroy them.
There is a former post nearby, the military there were once, and now the bandits have settled there. Can you deal with them?
Zashibis muzhik, keep the reward:
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"

Tons of weird and incoherent information, among which one can understand that the members of this squad are from the best military services. They probably supervised the experiments conducted at nuclear power plants before and after the first explosion, then were subsequently zombified.
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"
The device is hopelessly corrupted.
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"

"The Great Monolith said that he is in danger, the brothers are dispersed and put on combat readiness." No one expresses an opinion about what is happening outside, apparently today we have to kill or die. "I will happily do it for the sake of the Monolith."
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"

There is nothing remarkable about the device except one single note, dated June 2012: \n "The Monolith has ceased to appear to me in dreams for the last few days, instead, I began to see episodes from someone's life, perhaps even my own. Is it really He that is testing my faith? Is my faith in Him not strong enough? Then I am ready to show Him how unshakable I am: the day has come that tens of hundreds of fools will try to get close to His radiance. Today they will know the power of the defenders Mo nolite. "
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"

And this is the PDA of a member of the fraternity, who was already engaged in several other things than usual patrolling. Here is a description of a "revelatory room" in which, apparently, the brains were fixed by "infidels". The description of "mysterious visions" most likely resembles an image broadcast through a monitor. Apparently, in addition to the previously unknown zombifying waves of the Burner, the owners of this place did not hesitate to use the method of direct zombification on their future soldiers, through their TV sets. It's as old as the world, but it's more efficient here.
PDA of one of the members of the "Crystal"

"They loaded the bodies into the truck, gave out the instructions with instructions, the storm thundered, and finally the car was handed over to the brotherhood," Monolith "tells them where he will go." I remember the face of a man with a scar, I think I saw him somewhere. "
Otpravit'sya v Sarkofag
Find all possible information about the Crystal group
Return to the Inquisitor
The Inquisitor invited me to get to know himself more closely with the once legendary group of defenders of "Monolith" and find some information about them.
Transceiver
The old-style army transmitter, is used to communicate and transmit information.
Novikov
Find a gauss gun
The Cardan technician wants to get a gauss gun.

Yes, there is such a thing. Earlier I worked here, we even before the first explosion worked out any weapons for military needs, but after the explosion, we were evacuated and I quit my job altogether. I can not even imagine that the work on improving our prototype will continue. Stalker, I need a gauss gun, I already held it in my hands when one of the stalkers brought it to me, but I want to try to improve it somehow. Bring it for me, and I'll start accumulating batteries for it. Well, how?

Yes, there is such a thing. Earlier I worked here, we even before the first explosion worked out any weapons for military needs, but after the explosion, we were evacuated and I quit my job altogether. I can not even imagine that the work on improving our prototype will continue. Stalker, I need a gauss gun, I already held it in my hands when one of the stalkers brought it to me, but I want to try to improve it somehow. Bring it for me, and I'll start accumulating batteries for it. Well, how?
Thank you, here you are, I prepared a couple for you. Contact at any time.
Cheater
Worse than you are.
Vasyan has already deliberately foreseen what you were going to do. Do not do this!
Achieved achievement "Cheater"
First aid: check the signal or ignore
First aid: find a medical bag
First aid: return it to the stalker
First aid: accompany the wounded
First aid: talk to the saved
Another signal for help. Is it worth going to check or just pass by?
Kashpirovsky: \nHere there anyone nearby? SOS, bleed to death, by the tunnel.
Medical bag
The usual medical bag, I hope the drugs inside have not suffered.
Energy drink "Non Stop"
Excellent energy drink "Non Stop". Contains caffeine, taurine and a powerful vitamin complex that relieve fatigue and add strength. Not able to make even a step? Then this is exactly what you need.
Revival: Talk to the first brother
Revival: Talk to the second brother
Revival: Talk to the third brother
Revival: Talk to the fourth brother
Revival: Share Guess with the Mentor
In business ... I wonder why he does not suspect me?
Opening hours of the local merchant: from 6 am to 8 pm.
Okay, stop revenge and return to Radar, our fighters need help, talk to Griffin, he's in charge of our group of "Wings."
Find the annoying
Destroying Alpha
Someone annoys Fat and he wants this person no longer. We need to help him with this.
Find the artifact %s
You need to find this art on the job for the entrepreneur in the dump: %s
There is work as always. I need some artifact, will you get it?
There is work as always. I need an artifact: %s. Will you get it?
Well done, deserved:
Take the container to Sakharov

The trader from the dump offered work in the form of a messenger. You can refer this container, which is clearly not one art, but you can ... hmm, I do not even know who could open this case. Maybe Peregrine Falcons?
You look the guy experienced, I trust you. Bring this case to Sakharov?
Well done, man.
Contains a number of artifacts.
Zinc container
Vodka produced by some GSC company. Apparently burned. Suckling is bad, it helps sometimes to heal nerves, but it should not be abused.
Vodka "Cossacks"
Murder of stalkers
It is necessary to fill up this goal.
Many bastards annoy us and generally behave insolently. In general, I give you coordinates, and you eliminate the goal. Will you go to such a situation?
Well done, for not having to sit idle. Hold:
Murder of mutants
It is necessary to clean this place of mutants.
The creatures annoy us, prevent them from arranging ambushes and planting loshkov. I give the coordinates, you eliminate, I agree?
Well done, you try for the brat. Hold:
The creatures on the farm
Afgan worries that the bloodsuckers, who were recently seen on a farm nearby, are migrating towards the factory, we need to save the camp from possible danger.

We saw on the farm nearby our bloodsuckers, maybe there are several of them, I do not know. I'm afraid that these scum will make their way to the territory of the factory and worse, the lair somewhere under it will be arranged, and then look for fistula. The case for these places is egregious, so get them over as soon as possible. Well, can you fill up or find me another one?
Here, take the art - his men wrestled at some green jerk.
Strange tunnel
Zhuchila complains about the raspizdyaystvo local punks. You need to go to the railway tunnel opposite the depot and find the SVD.

There is one thing. One mudila went into the tunnel, apparently wanted to prove something to her friends, and you know this tunnel - a terrible place. Yes, and dick would be with him, but he poper there with a new SVD! Spies at someone, not fuck. Well, it's clear that the dick ran into some creatures there, they rifled his rifle from his hand, and that's the end of it. So do not go missing the same good? In general, you go there for her, eh?

There is one thing. One mudila went into the tunnel, apparently wanted to prove something to her friends, and you know this tunnel - a terrible place. Yes, and dick would be with him, but he poper there with a new SVD! Spies at someone, not fuck. Well, it's clear that the dick ran into some creatures there, they rifled his rifle from his hand, and that's the end of it. So do not go missing the same good? In general, you go there for her, eh?
Fuck, take gesheft and rest, and I'll think to whom this rake can be rafted.
We need to find a safer place to sleep.
Mentor: \nSo go to the Inquisitor's disposal, they'll need your help, and you'll come to me later.
It is necessary to return everything that once helped the brotherhood to defend the center of the zone.
Revival: talk to the Mentor
Renaissance: find and kill Degtyarev
Revival: find out from the documentation where the "item #62" was sent.
The Bible: \nWe start, hurry.
Documentation of recently issued orders
Attention is drawn only to Order No. 66, from which it follows that the sample of "Article No. 62", exactly like all the documentation for it, was delivered to NIICAZ.
There will be time, drop by to me. Caught very trivial business.
%c[255,238,153,26]Гунько: \nHey, you. If you want to go to the bar, you have to pay. Come to me, I'm standing by the car.
Clear out the lair of the chimeras
Return to the bridge
To cross the bridge, you need to perform a very interesting task. Or not... how tired of killing or bringing.
Rebirth: go to the bunker
Revival: find the control room
Revival: talk to the Gryphon
Revival: protect the control room
Revival: talk to the Gryphon
The Brotherhood again wants to use the Burner. I hope we succeed.
Revival: please Kitsenko
Revival: go to the Radar
Revival: talk to the leader of the "Wings"

That's the way it is. It is necessary to carry a box with two cut off heads of stalkers at a checkpoint to the debtors. Well, why? To frighten them? To show that the monolith is still inhabited by crazy people?
Revival: clear the barrier
Revival: go to the Radar
Revival: talk with the leader of the "Wings"
Who was pulling my tongue ... even though the grenades were given.
Revival: follow the Mentor
Revival: talk to the Mentor
Renaissance: kill the captives
Renaissance: talk to the Mentor
I do not know what will happen this time.
Revival: meet the rest
Revival: listen to the Mentor
Revival: talk to the Mentor
Revival: complete the first test
Revival: return to the Mentor
That's the very day you've been waiting for. Pass through the thorns and the Monolith will give you what you so much want.
Griffin: \nNow we need to the very end of the complex. So guys, neat - who knows what is waiting for us here.
Griffin: \nThat's the management room. It does not look very honest, to be honest. Fighters, let's discuss the next steps.

Doorkeeper: \nWant to the other side of the bridge, to Limansk? Have to pay. Fortunately for you to pay a little. To the right in the littered tunnel there is a brood of chimeras, kill them and then we'll talk. Go, go, and I'll watch you through binoculars, haha.
Doorkeeper: \nContained? Well done, we'll put the bridge down. And then these jumping creatures are already pretty nerve to us. If you want to go to the bargaining, I beg you.
Mentor: \nHey, the far left - I'm waiting for you in the near future, the work for you is already ready.

Mentor: \nWell, finished? Sorry I did not see his face at that moment, ha-ha-ha. So blow now on the radar, there you already have our intelligence. detachment "Wings" waiting, go to the commander, he will also put things into practice.
Mentor: \nI'll greet you, fighters of the new Monolith!
Mentor: \nYou are our only hope for the future, brothers. Soon I will test you individually and check whether you are worthy to be in our ranks.
Mentor: \nAnd yet are free. All but you, the far left. Perhaps I'll start with you.
Bold: \nListen, I think there should be something in that shop, as in this building in the middle of the complex.
Fat: \nI have a fucking foreboding, as if someone is picking in my brains...
Fat: \nSmoke on the skin from this place. Let's check the checkpoint box.
Bold: \nLet's get out of here as soon as possible!
Bold: \nListen, in my opinion there is nothing here, let's dump it, until those poor devils are in place.
Bold: \n Your mother, what a horror... who are they? Let's see if they left a trace after themselves.
"Monolith Wings" overall

An analog of a regular monolithic combat suit, though more lightweight and comfortable unlike its progenitor. Fit for the new realities of brotherhood, and this marks an unprecedented protection against radiation and psi radiation.
This drawer is locked.
Explore complex
Go back
Kill the controller
Talk to Fat
Go back to the village
Today we go with Fat to investigate the secrets of the factory complex. Who knows what awaits us there?
Records of the security chief

Absolutely useless records, which contain the names and paintings of all employees who have been repeatedly noted at the beginning and end of the work day. However, the dates indicate that this complex was used after the first explosion.
Production information
Nor is there any particular value, nothing extraordinary happened here, apparently the employees of this plant were mainly concerned with energy.
Book of accounting

Here is the basic information on accountable persons and the material structure of the new enterprise. The lion's share of funds is targeted, received from the state. No strange materials are found to be found, unfortunately, it can not be done, weapons issues were not dealt with exactly.
The PDA of the deceased stalker

It is in the killed state, but a note was attached under the cover, apparently duplicating the last message just for this case: "Stalker, if you read this, better leave from here for good." If you came here hoping to profit, then know that there is nothing here, although by the time the CCP is discovered, I think you understood everything yourself, I do not know if we will survive this night, but my feelings are extremely disgusting, as if something reads my thoughts and scoffs at us. We can not go, we are exhausted from fatigue, we make a small break here UWC. CCP hide just in case, to rend the mutants. "
Find a newbie's weapon
A stalker named Fat asked to get his own weapon for him, which he dropped during the careless investigation of the abnormal substation.
Bold: \nHey, stalker? Stalker! Help me please, here the bloodsucker from the neighboring house gobbles me up!
Bold: \nThank you, come here, I'll open!
Conduct a stalker
Stalker needs the services of a conductor who knows a particular area. It is necessary to deliver it where it should be.
Climb on the roof of the water tower
Wait an hour until it loads
Back to Cooking
Culinary asked to climb onto the roof of the water tower in order to download some entertaining information for "Svobodovtsev".

Oh, zdarov dude! Listen, as you know, we have a local network here basically, in the Zone, and so the bitch croaks out godlessly. Usually at us someone climbs on a water tower in a bloodsucking and shakes any chlamen for children as there the goodwill is good. If you want, it can be you. I here have opened to you already the necessary program, here from here to swing, have understood? Well, will you help?
Thank you, brother! If you liked it, you can come later, we climb legely on the tower.
"Svobodsky" laptop

The general notebook of the group, which it uses for entertainment purposes. There are some copies of pages in social networks, music, various games, movies from art house to the most popular at the moment, photos of carriers of this information and of course video clips with pictures, as well as pornographic pictures.
Overalls "Staratel"

The prototype of this "product" was the "Zarya" popular in the stalker's environment. To its main advantages, you can undoubtedly include the reduced weight of both bulletproof vest and clothing (rubber in many places was simply cut off) and an additional installed container for the artifact. Unfortunately for the conduct of military operations this sample of mediocre thought is not capable, but it will help in hunting for artifacts on the initial path of becoming a stalker.
OC-14 "Thunderstorm"

It is a kind of almost ordinary shabby "Storm", if not for one "but". These are not traces of natural exploitation, but experiments conducted by some local silly tech. As a result, the wear of the trunk increased more than 2 times! Simply put, unlike the original, this crap will literally fall apart in the process of use. But do not throw it out, right?
Find [ %s]
Sidorovich offers simple tasks to find parts of mutant bodies.

There is always work. Parts of the bodies of the local fauna are often interested in various private organizations or individuals, the direction of their activities often fluctuates... grrh something took me wrong there. In short, I give a tip, you drag. Ready?

There is always work. Parts of the bodies of the local fauna are often interested in various private organizations or individuals, the direction of their activities often fluctuates... grrh something took me wrong there. In short I need [ %s]. Are you taking?
Uh-huh, come here this shit. Here's your loot:
Roof
Pahan wanted me to shake the huckster in the dump.

So, you need to crank one business. Though our fools on the flea market do not recognize our roof, you must show them that they will need our services very much. Well, you never know what happens in life? Pay immediately and take it. There they have a couple of devils on the page, I do not think there will be any problems for you. And look, I'm rats along your trail, if it turns out that at least I have pinched myself a penny-they'll find me in the ditch. Well, are you coming?
That's all in the obshchak, and here are your hard earned:
Reflect the attack of zombies
Zombies again rod from Radar, you need to clean them.
Zombied again rod from Radar, how they got bored. We need to meet them on the approaches to Pripyat and kill them, if our people are there, I think they will help you. Are you coming?
Well done, take the artifactic:
Clear the parking lot from the bandits
The bandits are completely fucked up and settled almost in the most arduous post.

Well, if you can, then you can clean the parking lot from the bandits. These freaks are completely fucked up, once they allow themselves to have such neighbors. Yes, and we would cover them, but I do not have extra people. Are you coming?
Here are the money for the job:
Bury stalkers on the farm
The Sultan wants me to help fuck the stalker on the farm.
If you want, you can go to the farm with steep boys and shake the stalkers there. How did they fuck again there to appear. Are you coming?
Take your share, Rambo:
Fight off the first wave
Fight off the second wave
Fight off the third wave
Return to Max
Max asked to help break the barrier from the invasion of zombies.

Listen, then our intelligence recorded a large accumulation of zombies from the "Barrier", the cadavers migrate gradually because of the absence of radiation, and that's how they come out. We now each trunk in the account, will you help?
Thank you, dude. Take from me what's left:
Pseudo dogs
Jurov asked to cope with pseudo dogs terrorizing patrols.

Yes, the work has appeared. Clean out my specified in your PDA the square of the pseudo dogs, it's opposite the village. Cranky criminals can not roll them out, I can not send them too, so I need someone to solve the problem with them in the singular, or they'll gnaw our patrols at night.
Well done.
Find AK-74
Jurov complained that one of his subordinates lost his registered machine somewhere in the territory of the South checkpoint. I need to find him.

Oh, yes, we happened to have one hellish incident, namely one of the fighters fucked his machine gun. According to him, he should be somewhere in the territory of this Southern checkpoint, but where exactly - is unknown. If this is someone's joke, then I will arrange it. Listen, can you try and track this shit? You're still just idle, but just try to stick around during the test, I'll choke. And only here I do not need to yell, on that trunk my number was and his soldier fortunately wrote down, well, otherwise it's just - the criminal is shining.

Oh, yes, we happened to have one hellish incident, namely one of the fighters fucked his machine gun. According to him, he should be somewhere in the territory of this Southern checkpoint, but where exactly - is unknown. If this is someone's joke, then I will arrange it. Listen, can you try and track this shit? You're still just idle, but just try to stick around during the test, I'll choke. And only here I do not need to yell, on that trunk my number was and his soldier fortunately wrote down, well, otherwise it's just - the criminal is shining.
Hmm, good. Keep your pocket money.
Excursion to Hell
Sidorovich proposed to follow the yellow-throated, until they gain experience.

Work, eh? Well there is one thing here. You're not a green jerk, as far as I can judge by your profile in the CCP, grrh. Ugh. In short, some stupid ones piled up to me, asked me to show what, and how it is here in the Zone. Well, I sent them to the Fan, and this devil cunningly said that they say that KBM among newcomers no longer holds, well, I know that unnecessary deaths are not needed here, it does not restore its reputation, like nerve cells. So I asked them to wait at the village, until I find a suitable candidate. Well, are you leading these jerks around the neighborhood? It is necessary that they do not leave your empty pockets with you and with joyful mines on their faces.
Keep these presents to you:
Oh, zdarov man! At you you show us the romance here? Come on, we are at your disposal and relax, we are accommodating.
Did you want something? Do we do everything right?
Listen, thank you, man. We will never forget you, but if we reach the Executor, then we will also make your life a sugar one. Goodbye my friend!
Uh-huh.
Find 4 detectors, class "Veles"
Miklukha complained that the level of technical support of the group leaves much to be desired, it is necessary to find 4 detectors "Veles".

Oh, you're just in time, and then my soldiers are rarely at work zahazhivayut, but blame for this I can not. If not in the course, then in the old years during Lukash, Cook and other unconscious personalities, the level of material support of our group was negligible and from the "descendants" we got almost nothing. So, I want to resume the tradition of assembling artifacts so to say people's needs, but we only imagine a couple of detectors "Veles" and then one of them was broken. I need four such detectors, for each crying 5 thousand. Well, are you in the business?

Oh, you're just in time, and then my soldiers are rarely at work zahazhivayut, but blame for this I can not. If not in the course, then in the old years during Lukash, Cook and other unconscious personalities, the level of material support of our group was negligible and from the "descendants" we got almost nothing. So, I want to resume the tradition of assembling artifacts so to say people's needs, but we only imagine a couple of detectors "Veles" and then one of them was broken. I need four such detectors, for each crying 5 thousand. Well, are you in the business?
From thank you, take your money.
Defeat the debtors in the village
Miklukha knows how to repel the hunt for the debtors from the village in the village near Rostock, and for this I may be useful.

About the fighter, hello! It's a delicate matter for me to form. Do you know that the debtors simply monotonously try to consolidate themselves in one of the villages on the way to Rostka for years? No? In general, I know how to discourage their desire to come there once and for all and for this we must show them our tactics so to speak. There just arrived some fresh forces, I really do not know why they are there, but if we defeat them in half the number, imagine how much pressure it will produce? Well, I'm interested in you?
Wonderful! Well done, take this trunk. And do not curl yourself so, the trunk is good, of course not for the open spaces of the military, but here and there it certainly should come in handy, hehe.
Learn about the fate of fellow debtors
Dolgovets asked to find out about the fate of his comrades, whom he saw for the last time in the Cemetery of Technology near the chemical anomalous zone.

Work? I do not think you can help me. Although wait, here's a drink. I went with my comrades to reconnoitre to a technology cemetery, well, you know this bloody place - a vast wasteland with skeletons of various techniques. Here we were informed that somewhere there the Liberty detachment was seen, but we did not find these ushlopki... but found something else. A frightening thing that made my friends... fall down on their knees and grab my head. I do not know why the same thing did not happen to me, as well as why I ran away. It's a shame. Listen, I certainly do not believe that the guys are still alive, they have not had news for a couple of days, but can you at least confirm their death? Coordinates of that place, I'll throw you on the PDA, it's near some abnormal zone with chemical evaporation. Will you help?
So they are dead? Damn, you... counters. Forgive me, here take my backup barrel and the optics to it. Thank you.
Collect the bark from the mutilated trees
Sakharov asked him to help him with researching the local flora and go to the Red Forest for samples of bark.

For a long time we have been arguing about the level of abnormal and radioactive interference in the structure of vegetation, in particular the so-called "Red Forest" trees, but all our attempts to understand this are being broken by the insurmountable obstacles that our scientific groups had to face. Can you go there and take samples of the bark of the trees there for us? They say the most mutilated are standing near the anomaly "Symbiont", here they are and I need.
Thank you very much! Take, we here have thrown off the professorship:
Collect bark from mutilated trees
Herman asked to help him with researching the local flora and go to the Red Forest for samples of bark.

And, welcome. We always have a job, our MBU is engaged in somehow or other studies of flora including, for example, some time ago we asked a stalker to deliver us some plant to study its properties. Now we are interested in an anomalous grove in the "Red Forest", in the middle of which there is an anomalous zone "Symbion". We will need samples of bark from the most mutilated trees that you will only find. Do you agree?
Oh, great! Give them here. Take from me a useful artifactic:
Escort debtors
It is necessary to cover the debtors when conducting measurements of anomalies on the orders of scientists.
We need to lead the debtors around the landfill, they carry out some orders of scientists. They have few people, so someone should cover their backs, are you going?
Thank you, man. Here is your reward.
Destroy civil zombies
Amber came to the dump zombies and nailed to one of the garbage piles, you need to neutralize them.
There is a good job for a hunter. You're a hunter, right? Keep the crab! In general, you need to clean one of the garbage heaps from the zombies, coordinate you on the PDA. Ready?
From the handsome, take honestly earned:
Kill the Buruer Pyro Maniacs
At night, warming by the frying around one of the anomalous zones go out burer. They should not go out anymore.

The work is dangerous and must be done until morning. Not far from here, in the place of accumulation of abandoned equipment, some strange bure- ers crawl out and terrorize local stalkers. Many are already afraid to hunt for artifacts at night and work as a whole is difficult, so you will go with a couple of indifferent stalkers. Will you help them?
Well done, keep your share:
Find [ %s]
Suitcases are needed [ %s] for guys who are stuck in Pripyat.
Yes, I have a list of the primary things that I need. In particular, ammunition, repair kits and medicines. Are you taking?
I have a list of the primary things I need. In particular, ammunition, repair kits and medicines. I need [ %s] now. Are you taking?
Thank you.
Obtain [ %s]
Noah needs [ %s] for his dog.
Now, when puppies grow up I can not hang around anywhere. I need your help in harvesting my dogs.
Now, when puppies grow up I can not hang around anywhere. I need your help in harvesting my dogs. [ %s] just fine.
What is the assignment? Oh, yes.
Clear the "Southern Plateau" from snorkels
Noah is asked to relieve him of annoying and apparently intelligent snorkels.
Listen, I need your help. These creatures, snorkels have long been watching me. They wait for me to show weakness and then attack. Kill them first.
Take it and leave it until I suspect you of a congress with snorkels.
Find a Shotgun "Protector"
Noah needs a new shotgun.

My weapon is very bad, get me something better, well, for example, "Protect". And then how do I think that these creatures from everywhere their hands pull, feel... you need something more capacious and quick-firing.

My weapon is very bad, get me something better, well, for example, "Protect". And then how do I think that these creatures from everywhere their hands pull, feel... you need something more capacious and quick-firing.
Come here and get out.
Destroy the base of the bandits
It is necessary to knock out the bandits from their main place of dislocation in the marshes.

This work must be done before the morning, as in the camp at this time, the least of all these bastards. I've gathered the indifferent guys who can get even with the bandits at their main base in a fishing village, will you go with them? Only the guys do not kill, if you are alone, I will not forgive you for this.
Thank you, here's from me. You are worthy to wear this uniform.
Are you our guide? I'll mark the right place on your PDA. You need to ensure our safety on the way to it and after we finish, take us back. You will receive the reward upon return to the camp.
Did you want something? We need to hurry, it's dangerous to stay here for a long time.
Thank you, stalker. You've done a good job, here's your reward.
Good.
You here mean connoisseur of the neighborhood? Hmm, well, lead.
Wanted something? If not, then do not distract.
Thank you, man - take our barrel good.
Good.
Accompany scientists
It is necessary to place scientists in a certain place and ensure their safety while they conduct research and then bring them back to the camp.

I need someone to cover our guys during planned measurements of abnormal activity. Looking back on your experience of staying in this place, I think that you are ideal for this approach. Do you agree with my statement?
Thank you, stalker. Here is your reward.
Nothing remarkable stovepipe
Miklukha

Often used by stalkers as a backup option in the event of unforeseen circumstances. Its main feature is weak, but nevertheless simple straps that can be dumped together with a backpack at any moment and quickly run away. Compact enough and space-saving. \n %c [255,238,153,26] When used, allows you to reset your backpack with some content.

For a more detailed review of the battle, click on the "tilde" button and type in the appeared console: "demo_record 1" (without quotes). Camera control is performed: "w", "s", "a", "d" and in combination with the clamped "ctrl". Exit this mode through the "esc" key.

Or a "black box", as people like to call it in the media. Airborne recorders are used for recording the internal systems of the aircraft and crew negotiations, in general for all that allows to determine the possible cause of aircraft crash. In the Zone such devices are equipped with each aircraft, although the "black box" is not always suitable. In the Zone, they can be interested in the military themselves for quite justifiable reasons, as well as all sorts of shady ones, and at hour and time the traders popular in the stalker's environment.

I listen with my ears pushed open.

... hmm. Look, this is the Bar. It is completely safe for "Friends of Debt" and neutrals. 
Western - Wild Territory, this is the former western part of the Rostock plant. According to rumors, it's better not to go there at night. The most advantageous points for shooting are measured, you will get in between two dangers. At the bottom mutants, from which it is most advantageous to climb to the hill in the form of former warehouses, the heights themselves are controlled by snipers and arrows of mercenaries. About wild territory all. 
Feather - Army Warehouses. The best "friends" of "Debt" - "Freedom" keep them. Nothing special there, except that this is the last "Bastion" of normal people. 
Even more - Cemetery Techniques, stock up on horseracing and shot, if you go there. Mutants there are many and sometimes not childish. 
South - Dump, complete anarchy there, mutants, thieves, but there is also a "flea market", on which you can pretty well bargain plus. 
This is all in the neighboring territories. What else to tell?
Everything is clear in principle, but you were talking about "normal thinking" and "Bastion".

North of the Army warehouses the territory of the "Monolith" - "Radar", an eerie place, stay away from it. If you're going there, then first of all you have to stock up with cartridges and first-aid kits.
Thank you for the information, I will consider and recommend you to friends if they need what you make a living.
Tell us about yourself, Gromov, if not difficult.

I moved from the Agroprom, promoted me. Before he got to the Zone, he was an auto mechanic. Appreciate my hands in the group, so they decided to translate here. I prefer heavy and assault weapons, snipers I hate in terms of upgrades.
And then the bottles are so close, Duty is for a healthy lifestyle ?.

I can, work tiresome, and boring here - just do not go back, there is no base on the Agroprom. Although I do not know, I would have been alive then, they say the base was lost during the release in 2011. Something we have moved away from the topic, do not be shy, give your toys here.
Now I will determine what and how, wait.
What can you say about the Cold?
And what can I say, the guys consider his views on the groupings correct.
And what did he gain such "love"?

You know, Lebedev, though I did not find him, but people began to dislike him. He did not take an interest in the opinion of the members of the group when he moved them on the very last campaign. That mercenary certainly helped us, but it was not worth the "candle-ovchinka." Those who stayed at the base could not do anything with the reinforcements of this rabble returning after the defeat of the "renegades". The meaning of the capture of the Bolot was reduced to zero, the sacrifices also turned out to be in vain both on the way to the Chernobyl NPP, and here.
I think the indignation of the guys about the former leader becomes clear.

Listen further... Upon the return of the remnants of the detachment, we had to conduct a protracted struggle and return everything back. We ourselves would not be able to manage ourselves in life, The cold through the familiar "free" stalkers came out to the guys from Svalka and Cordon, helped the loners and the charisma of the new leader. Moreover, he gave the floor to all fighters without exception, not to leave from here. Any help, but not the life of our guys.
You know, whoever Lebedev was, but you have already ceased to be that grouping that was originally.
Well, this is your opinion, not devoid of meaning. There are no global goals for us now, as an even count and common views. So, it's time to tie with fables and probably buy something.
Hand in hand.
You have a dumb dog.
